backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing two UI modification features tied to PaymentPage.tsx, including removed copy-link action and updated UPI button.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App, PaymentPage, styles, config, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Empty file placeholder containing no styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and renders PaymentPage as the root route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing login, identity state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base with OKLCH color variables and themed light/dark styles for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentPage.tsx: Premium UPI payment page UI with features list and a primary button that opens a hardcoded UPI deep link.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s schema version, current state, feature list, and new feature requests for building a UPI payment page. Contains configuration details, UI requirements, and UPI link parameters used across the project.
